function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Spread of covid-19 in closed areas due to poor air quality and ventilation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deployment in university facilities, office buildings, and industrial facilities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of low-cost open-source hardware and wireless communication","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Remote-configurability of the system","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of ieq monitoring systems in buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor air quality measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate thermal comfort measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in public buildings in winter leading to poor indoor air quality and increased risk of covid-19 transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Trade-off between sensor node cost and data quality in wireless gas sensor networks, leading to challenges in accurately monitoring indoor air quality.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of suitable chemical analysis technologies to determine the concentration of gaseous air pollutants specifically and sensitively at low-cost, posing challenges for long-term, stable detection.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of wireless sensor networks introduces security vulnerabilities.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of indoor environmental quality ieq variables could lead to undetected environmental hazards and poor air quality.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of information about communication technologies used in building monitoring systems may lead to security vulnerabilities and data breaches.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective implementation of cloud and fog computing iot applications could lead to data integration challenges and operational inefficiencies.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of low-cost open-source hardware and software may result in lower quality and reliability of monitoring systems.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on bluetooth, zigbee, and wifi for communication in wireless sensor networks wsn may limit coverage and data transmission capabilities.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Energy consumption and cost of each monitoring node may impact the scalability and deployment of wireless monitoring systems.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of multiple communication protocols in iot applications can lead to interoperability issues and complexity in system integration.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for strict qos requirements and performance limitations of communication protocols may lead to suboptimal iot system performance.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for spread of contagious diseases through iot systems and infrastructure.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proximity of smart ieq sensor nodes to each other in wide buildings may increase the risk of contagious diseases propagation.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for contamination if smart ieq sensors are not properly sanitized and maintained.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Centralized configuration at the cloud introduces a single point of failure and security vulnerability.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wireless communication and use of mqtt protocol may be susceptible to interference and hacking.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Centralized configuration of ieq monitoring system","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Local collection of data at ieq concentrator","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sending data periodically to the cloud","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of wifi technology in public and private buildings for ieq monitoring.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of vlan intranet to separate ieq monitoring traffic from mainstream internet traffic.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of mqtt protocol for communication in ieq monitoring systems.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ieee802.11 and ieee802.1q as standards for wifi technology and vlan","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ieq concentrator holding the mqtt broker for connecting all ieq sensor nodes in the area","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Issues with ieq sensor nodes triggering the reset procedure","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of low-cost opensource hardware may result in lower reliability and accuracy of ieq data.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deployment of smart ieq sensor nodes anywhere in the premises may lead to incomplete or uneven coverage of monitoring.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on wifi connectivity for ieq measurements may lead to data transmission issues and interruptions in monitoring.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate wifi coverage may limit the deployment of smart ieq sensor nodes, leading to incomplete monitoring of certain areas within the built environment.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient energy efficiency measures for smart sensors may result in higher energy consumption and reduced autonomy of the monitoring system.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring indoor air quality is crucial for avoiding the spread of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Configurable quantity and types of sensors may lead to inadequate coverage for monitoring key parameters","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of different sensor buses spi and i2c increases complexity and potential for technical failures.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in sensor precision and accuracy for temperature, humidity, and air quality measurements.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Selection of lower-cost sensors for humidity and air quality measurements may compromise data accuracy and reliability.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of different sensor types and buses may introduce compatibility issues and data inconsistencies.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher cost of certain sensors may limit widespread deployment, reducing coverage and accuracy of environmental monitoring.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Manufacturing cost and process may limit scalability and affordability of the monitoring system.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cost of components may be prohibitively high for large-scale production, reducing accessibility of the prototype","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Energy consumption of the smart ieq sensor node may be unsustainable for long-term operation","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sustainability issues related to iot systems may not be well understood by students and staff, leading to suboptimal usage and environmental impact","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible overconsumption of energy by the iot devices leading to increased operational costs.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"}]}
